result.eng: Is Irish difficult, in your opinion?
result.ga: An bhfuil an Ghaeilge deacair dar leat
result.orig: An bhfuil an Ghaeilge deacair dar leat
result.html: An bhfuil an Ghaeilge deacair dar leatIs Irish difficult, in your opinion?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil an Ġaeilge deacair dar leatIs Irish difficult, in your opinion?

result.eng: What is the solution to the problem, in your opinion?
result.ga: Cad é réiteach na faidhbe dar leat
result.orig: Cad é réiteach na faidhbe dar leat
result.html: Cad é réiteach na faidhbe dar leatWhat is the solution to the problem, in your opinion?
result.ponchtml: Cad é réiteaċ na faiḋbe dar leatWhat is the solution to the problem, in your opinion?

result.eng: The theory is wrong, according to the experts.
result.ga: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaithe
result.orig: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaithe
result.html: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaitheThe theory is wrong, according to the experts.
result.ponchtml: Ní fíor an teoiric dar leis na saineolaiṫeThe theory is wrong, according to the experts.

result.eng: According to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.
result.ga: Dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoire
result.orig: Dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoire
result.html: Dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoireAccording to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis na coṁarsana tá siad imiṫe ar saoireAccording to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.

result.eng: According to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ga: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.orig: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.html: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis an ollaṁ níl sé soiléir in aon ċor cén fáṫ ar ṫarla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.

result.eng: Going to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ga: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.html: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadhGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḋoiliġ a ġaḃáil ċun faoiside Ina ḋiaiḋ sin dar leis féin go gcaiṫfeaḋ sé an gealltanas a ċoṁlíonaḋGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.

result.eng: He thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ga: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.orig: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.html: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithneHe thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis gur ċeart dó glór a ċinn a aiṫneHe thought he should recognize his voice.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: Dar le Babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
